columns.a_id: A unique identifier for each review entry.
columns.u_id: The identifier of the user who submitted the review.
columns.i_id: The identifier of the item being reviewed.
columns.rating: The score given by the user to the item, typically reflecting their level of satisfaction.
columns.rank: An optional ranking or order for the reviews provided by the user.

review.table_description: The 'review' table stores user-generated reviews of items, linking users to their reviews and the items being reviewed, along with the corresponding ratings and ranks.

columns.i_id: The unique identifier for each item in the database.
columns.title: The name or label given to the item.

item.table_description: The item table contains a list of items, each distinguished by a unique identifier and associated with a title.

columns.u_id: A unique identifier for each user account in the database.
columns.name: The name associated with the user account.

useracct.table_description: The useracct table stores information about user accounts, including unique identifiers and names for each user.

columns.source_u_id: This column represents the unique identifier of the user who expresses trust in another user.
columns.target_u_id: This column represents the unique identifier of the user who is being trusted by the source user.
columns.trust: This column indicates the strength of trust that the source user has for the target user, expressed as a numerical value.

trust.table_description: The 'trust' table stores relationships of trust between users in the system, detailing which users trust which others and the degree of trust expressed.
